name: Malcolm!
author: Malcolm!

sections.description:
Malcolm! makes customer self service easy with FAQs, Knowledge Base, Workflows, No-code Forms, Payments, Integrations and much more. Find out further details at https://malcolm.app.

Our WordPress plugin makes it even simpler to bring the content you create in Malcolm! into your WordPress site.

Usage

Insert Inline embeds with the following short code.

[malcolm_inline "<Insert Embed ID>"]

Insert Overlay embeds with the following short code.

[malcolm_popup "<Insert Embed ID>"]

Widget embeds will show automatically.
sections.faq: Visit Malcolm! Support for frequently asked questions.

short_description: Bring your Malcolm! content into your Wordpress site.
description:
Malcolm! makes customer self service easy with FAQs, Knowledge Base, Workflows, No-code Forms, Payments, Integrations and much more. Find out further details at https://malcolm.app.

Our WordPress plugin makes it even simpler to bring the content you create in Malcolm! into your WordPress site.

Usage

Insert Inline embeds with the following short code.

[malcolm_inline "<Insert Embed ID>"]

Insert Overlay embeds with the following short code.

[malcolm_popup "<Insert Embed ID>"]

Widget embeds will show automatically.

screenshots.caption: In MyMalcolm go to "Share > Plugins" to install and active the plugin.
In the embed code window toggle to "Embedding in a Wordpress site?" for Wordpress instructions.
In the Malcolm! Wordpress Settings paste your Instance ID.
Display your content directly in your Wordpress pages and posts.
